input.description:
JSON payload to the lambda function.

The following arguments are optional:

lifecycleScope.description: Lifecycle scope of the resource to manage. Valid values are `CREATE_ONLY` and `CRUD`. Defaults to `CREATE_ONLY`. `CREATE_ONLY` will invoke the function only on creation or replacement. `CRUD` will invoke the function on each lifecycle event, and augment the input JSON payload with additional lifecycle information.

qualifier.description: Qualifier (i.e., version) of the lambda function. Defaults to `$LATEST`.

result.description: String result of the lambda function invocation.

triggers.description: Map of arbitrary keys and values that, when changed, will trigger a re-invocation.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Invocation resources.
